name: chartdb
tagline: A self-hosted tool for documenting software architecture with diagrams
description: ChartDB helps development teams document and manage software architecture using visual diagrams and Markdown. It features version control integration and self-hostable deployment for engineering organizations and teams.

features.title: Architecture Documentation
features.description: Visual diagrams for software architecture. Clear documentation

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Document with markdown alongside diagrams. Rich content

features.title: Version Control
features.description: Git integration for tracking changes. Historical record

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multiple users can contribute to documentation. Shared knowledge

features.title: Visual Diagrams
features.description: Create clear architecture visualizations. Better understanding

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep architecture docs on your infrastructure. Data security

features.title: Engineering Focus
features.description: Built for development teams and organizations. Developer-friendly
